name: SmartOilGauge
0:
”Alexa, ask Smart Oil Gauge how much oil I have.”
”When will I need oil?”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart oil gauge
des: The Smart Oil Gauge skill allows our users to ask Alexa how much heating oil they have in their tank, and how much oil they are burning. In order to access this skill, users must have a Smart Oil Gauge wireless level sensor installed, and an active account linked to that sensor. You can ask Smart Oil Gauge "How much oil do I have", or "When will I need oil". To get started, link your account using your Smart Oil Gauge username and password.
